data.text: @Libe1997 @CTVNews @niknanos Wasnt vaxxed supposed to keep you out of hospitals and ICUS, they said that time and time again, they were very wrong #science
@Serial_Typist @GETTRcrypto @GhetlerJordan @CTVNews @niknanos I see you used the term "you people". Do you fancy yourself as someone better then others?

@Libe1997 @PaleoDom @CTVNews @niknanos However you twist it, vid still has a recovery rate of 99%. But now we have vax in the hospital due to the side effects. Stop trying to divide and be sensitive to people who thought they were doing their part that are now affected, some for life, due to this experiment.

@Libe1997 @PaleoDom @CTVNews @niknanos You know when the 80% vacksed are making up the same numbers per capita in cases and hospitalization then that 95% efficacy that you were promised is complete bull shyte...Reality is Hard.
@GETTRcrypto @GhetlerJordan @CTVNews @niknanos Ps. I look forward to your dream currency’s upcoming severe regulations as a result of Putin’s war. Good luck with that, lol.

@GETTRcrypto @GhetlerJordan @CTVNews @niknanos Planning a trip there, were ya? Every ‘argument’ you people come up with is more embarrassing than the last.   Hop on a flight to Ukraine and then get back to us on Freedom. And read the first part of the Charter….slowly and carefully…you’ll see it.
